channel.title: Scape-JAVA/` SJ_ for Server Helper badge
channel.description:
Hello, staff team.
I'm writing this post to nominate the user Scape-JAVA for the Server Helper award/badge. I believe he'd be perfect for this position, he is an asset to MoparScape and should be awarded rightfully. I realise he is an ex-moderator, which shows the community think highly of him.
His post count is currently around 5000 and 1750(ish) of those are in the Server Help board. Every time I see him reply to a thread, or the majority of the time, it's a decent reply with a good logic behind it.
I believe he deserves this, however the decision is yours.
Best Regards, Ruby.

item.title: Scape-JAVA/` SJ_ for Server Helper badge
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Domain Approval

I also have a moderator, an ex-moderator and a community member in my development team, we don’t aim to cause any harm through this.

Coincidence?

Read full topic
item.source: Scape-JAVA/` SJ_ for Server Helper badge
